title: Can we have harsher punishments in Ranked for AFKers and leavers?
body: I feel like 5 minutes is nothing to them, I had someone leave because he was tilted and we would've won if he didn't rage quit.

replies.body: I see where you're coming from, however sometimes in champion select things just don't work out and it's clear someone is going to troll in-game... when this happens I like to know there's the last minute resort of dodging to avoid it :/
